data.name: Dakar 18 - Desafío Inca Rally
data.detailed_description:
The Desafío Inca Rally is part of the world-famous Dakar Series, a number of cross-country rallies, and is the second event of this series to be added to Dakar 18.

As with the main game the team at Bigmoon Entertainment focused all their effort on simulating this challenge to make it as realistic as possible. It will enhance the already existing world of the main game. To make sure players do not get lost in the challenging world, the DLC includes brand new road books – again based on the original road books handed out to the drivers during the event.

data.short_description: The Desafío Inca Rally is part of the world-famous Dakar Series, a number of cross-country rallies, and is the second event of this series to be added to Dakar 18.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-6100 @ 3.3 GHz or equivalent Core i3-7340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD HD 7870 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690k @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or better
